name: Playschool Hero
description:
Brave teddy bear is trapped in playschool for a night. Bad toys from space came in and they are trying to destroy him. Teddy Bear must rescue other Teddy Bears.

Assets used:

8 bit sounds by: hosch license: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/

12 Player Movement SFX by: leohpaz licenses: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/ https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ 

Colorful blocks by: Iwan Gabovitch

Miks, a 2D Teddy Bear by: doudoulolita licences: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/ https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/ http://www.gnu.org/licenses/old-licenses/gpl-2.0.html

Dice by: Napoleon licence: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/

MoradM's hallway parallax-redy by: K-Arthur-Games licence: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

"Skyll" Floating Skull Worm by: qubodup licences: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/ http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.html http://www.gnu.org/licenses/old-licenses/gpl-2.0.html
